channel.title: Thecrazymat greifed my wheat
channel.description: yesterday, i had just started building a house in moparcraft, when i reilized the werent many mobs/food sources near my house, so i decided to plant wheat. when i whent on this morning i saw that all my wheat was removed so i started to co inspect, i planted 8 wheat and only found one block of evidance.i dont know how to add screenshots so could someone tell me how :(

item.title: Thecrazymat greifed my wheat
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Take a screenshot with f2 on your keyboard and upload the image to www.imgur.com. The image will appear in file called ‘screenshots’ within your minecraft folder.

Read full topic
